name: SHOTinGUNception
description:
SHOTinGUNception is a top-down arcade survival game where you try to last as long as you can against a never-ending onslaught of shotgun enemies.

It seems however that you are a special kind of shotgun, one that shoots other shotguns that also shoot shotguns, this will propel you in the opposite direction, also functioning as your way of moving around this world. Sorry for loud sound effects

However be wary, every 10 levels a boss will spawn...

Made by Codex & Pookleemon

Comment down below how long you survived!

The SUSSY IMPOSTER SHOTGUN!!!
